title: Honor Level 0.
body:
So sadly I was banned the week the new honor system came out and when I was unbanned I was honor level 0 obviously. but since then I've been a child of the lord, reformed. I average 2-3 honors a game and play quite a bit but I've yet to leave honor level 0. I've been honor level 0 since my friends were 2, they've all been 4 for a while now but I've yet to reach level 1.

My question is how long does it take to get out of level 0?

replies.body: Yeah, honor is bugged I'm pretty sure. When the new honor system came out you couldn't get to honor 3 for a couple of weeks, maybe even a month or two, don't remember. In that time I got demoted to honor 0 a couple of days before they actually updated the honor system and let people become honor 3, which sucked. But ever since I've been stuck in honor 0. I'm almost certain it's bugged, and you can't get out of honor 0. I legit haven't been toxic for at least a month and am still honor level 0.. hope they fix it sometime soon.

It looks like when honor launched, you did actually start out at honor rank 2 like everyone else. After the launch, there was one instance that dropped you to honor rank 1, and then another following that which dropped you to rank 0. Since they were two separate punishments that dropped you each time, that's most likely why it's taking awhile to rank back up. The progress you were making towards rank 2 might have been nullified by the punishment that dropped you to rank 0.

But if I got banned 2 weeks ago, does it mean I'm not receiving the end of season rewards (not this account, but my EUW main)? Because it really sucks. I got no previous record of being toxic. It was the first time (2 games in a row - one of them with a 4-premade) and I got insta 14-day ban, no chat restricts... (as I said, account was clean - never toxic, one time when I had a bad day I just snapped and I get punished with this...) Given the time I invested in this game in order to reach Diamond 3, as well as the thousands of euros of skins, icons, etc. over the years.. I'd say it's quite a nefarious act against me.. taking my season end rewards too.. Like haven't any of you ever had a terrible day at work, get back home to chill with League, then have someone step on your nerves continuously..? Or am I the only one...?

When we're talking about getting [**disqualified from end of season rewards**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068), it's important to keep in mind that only actual punishments will disqualify you. It looks like this account currently has a protective suspension on it due to a hacker compromising it. Hit us back up in that ticket after looking over the questions again, and we can help you get your account back. These types of suspensions won't disqualify you.

Riot should have allowed us, suspended players, to get the rewards if we got honor lvl 2+

The recent [**Honor FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ) actually touched on this a little bit. I do believe there are going to be new end of season rewards for those that have a certain level of Honor, but we still need to wait for all of those details.

> I already have Medieval Twitch and Grey Warwick skins! What do I get instead?
> 
> If you already have those skins, you’ll still get a chance to pick up some new champions through champion shards in Honor Capsules, with more rewards coming through them over time. Also, Honor-exclusive loading screen flairs let others know when you’ve received honors from teammates and you’ll unlock even more rewards at the end of the season.

I have a question about my situation. I received a  two week ban for a game that I broke the rule in July. I'm aware of what I did but I felt this was put off really bad. Riot issued the ban two months later when the new honor system came out. I was unaware of the consequences and feel like I've been punished harshly. My honor level dropped to 0 and I can no longer earn keys. This is real frustrating for me because later on I was notified that my cap was unlocked and now able to receive honor again. However I've been playing for 2 months now on a daily basis and these honors that I receive postgame seems like it has no effect. I can't seem to earn rewards and being left out, and a ban being issued 2 months later when coincidentally the new honor system came out seems a bit shady. I just can't seem to shake of this feeling that being told to keep "casually playing" will increase my honor when nothing is changing.

I just pulled up your account to double check for you. Your Honor *is* progressing at a normal rate now. But it's important to keep in mind that everyone will progress through the ranks at a different pace. It all depends on a number of games you're playing as well as the number of times you get honored. You may want to look at others and say "Why did they rank up before me?", but the system isn't designed to compare yourself to others simply because everyone plays at different rates.

Hi
I have been playing roughly 170+ games since my 2 weak suspension (i counted them) and i was eligible to earn rewards again after about 50 games. So we have about 120 games. When the new honor system came out i managed to lvl 1 rank up every day except for lvl 5.  Now im not even able to get from lvl 0 to 1 in 50 days. I have asked customer support multiple times but they simply refuse to answer. Could you look up weather my account is progressing normally? And weather im close to rank up?

Hello, I've been searching for a while now and I cant find an answer anywhere. Does being honor 0 disqualify from end of season rewards? or Just honor rewards and key frags? I've just received my second chat restriction which dropped me from 1 to 0. Never been banned beyond that.

No, having low honor level won't impact end of season rewards, but if you've got your account banned after halfway into August this year IIRC, you won't earn the rewards. The key fragment drops are dependable on your honor level though, so you won't get any keys until you're over level 0.
are borders considered end of season rewards? my ban was relieved on the 22nd of august and im just curious if ill get my border and stuff

Rito, your system is bugged, I'm still level 0 after 3 months, and you need to fix it. Also, please read your community's forums, we are all dying over here and haven't had the sensational feeling of opening a chest in a while. So I ask again, please fix the bugged system.
i got chat restricted about 2-3 months ago as well. im lv 1 and it doesnt seem like im moving towards 2 at all. how long is it supposed to take?

So I was banned for 14 days about a month and a half ago, had no previous infractions and haven't had any since. 
I'm currently still level 0 after playing daily (pretty much), while a friend of mine had the same ban a couple of days later and got out of honour 0 by getting honoured twice. I've been good riot, giz some key fragments. 

Any chance i could get a review on my honour progress?
i believe you can not get back from 0 i was band ages ago for being toxic ive been fine since and have been honored most games 2/4 honors and im still lvl0

My 14 year old stepson was in town and I let him play. Apparently he was toxic and my account got a two week ban. I have been off the ban for a month and a half and been playing normally, receiving honors from teammates and I'm still at honor 0. when will this end?
Thanks, it just seems like nothing is happening.
I've just level up from lvl 0 to lvl 1 after a lot of game (200+), a lot of time (4 weeks), some honor ofc and may be some not legit report received. Hf farming
